name: Haunt
desc: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.\n\nHaunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.

name: Essence Shift
desc: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.

name: Dragon Slave
desc: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

name: Gush
desc: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 4 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Ghost Shroud
desc: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

name: Leap
desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 2.5 seconds.

name: Hand of God
desc: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.

name: Frozen Sigil
desc: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.

name: Flak Cannon
desc: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

name: Moonlight Shadow
desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
